recipe.recipe_name: Grilled Chicken with Spinach and Pine Nut Pesto
recipe.ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Ground black pepper, to taste, 2 cups fresh spinach leaves, 1/4 cup pine nuts, toasted, 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 1 tablespoon lemon juice
recipe.directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Brush chicken breasts with 1 tablespoon olive oil and season with 1/2 teaspoon salt and black pepper. Grill chicken for about 6-8 minutes on each side or until fully cooked and juices run clear. Meanwhile, combine spinach leaves, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, extra-virgin olive oil, garlic, lemon zest, and lemon juice in a food processor. Pulse until ingredients form a coarse paste, creating the pesto. Remove chicken from grill and let it rest for a few minutes. Top each chicken breast with a spoonful of the spinach and pine nut pesto before serving.
